name: ANIMAL_ID
title: ANIMAL_ID
description: INTERBULL REGISTRATION CODE WHICH HAS EXACTLY 19 CHARACTERS. MADE UP OF FOUR COMPONENTS: BREED (3), COUNTRY (3), SEX(1), REGISTRATION NUMBER(12)

name: DAM_ID
title: DAM_ID
description: 12 DIGIT ALPHANUMERIC FIELD THAT CONTAIN THE UNIQUE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER ASSIGNED TO THE ANIMAL BY THE RESPECTIVE BREED ASSOCIATION. IT HAS TO BE RIGHT JUSTIFIED IN THE FIELD (WITH LEADING '0'S).

name: SIRE_ID
title: SIRE_ID
description: 12 DIGIT ALPHANUMERIC FIELD THAT CONTAIN THE UNIQUE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER ASSIGNED TO THE ANIMAL BY THE RESPECTIVE BREED ASSOCIATION. IT HAS TO BE RIGHT JUSTIFIED IN THE FIELD (WITH LEADING '0'S).

name: SOURCE_OF_DATA
title: SOURCE_OF_DATA
description: See contacts list under 'Source of Data' column
